name: S.S. Demise
description:
On a routine trip to deliver cargo to a near-earth spaceport, a stray meteorite hit your ship and locked it's thrusters to always be on! Onboard systems show you only have about 2 minutes left till the damn thing explodes, so why not have some fun with it?

Hurl yourself through asteroid belts and amass big combos to try and get the highest score you can in 2 minutes! And, make sure you don't run out of gas, or you're gonna be space steak in no time.

Controls:

  • A or Left Arrow - Turn Counter-Clockwise
  • D or Right Arrow - Turn Clockwise
  • Both turn buttons at once - Boost
